price: Enti saa Da no deε, wͻn a wͻdi bͻne no kyεwpa no ho mma mfasoͻ, na yεmma wͻn kwan (sε wͻbεpa kyεw) anaasε wͻbεsrε bͻnefakyε.
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yanfaʿu alladhīna ẓalamū maʿdhiratuhum walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
translations: will be allowed to make amends
